features = ['Age','Spending Score (1-100)']
X = df[features]

bandwidth = estimate_bandwidth(X,quantile=0.20)
meanshift = MeanShift(bandwidth=bandwidth,bin_seeding=True)
meanshift.fit(X)

labels = meanshift.labels_
